price: rrobat do t’i kenë prej katrani e zjarri do t’ua mbështjellë fytyrat,
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
